Precision Farming Robots

AIRbee provides autonomous and profitable solutions for the agricultural application of robotics. By using corn-farming data and artificial intelligence herbizice can be saved. Farmers can benifit due to the increased automation. This enables ecological benefits as well economic advantage on the global agricultural market.
